nodes.text: A multipack was essential equipment carried by a scout, designed to carry a multitude of tools. Standard multipacks included three medpacs, two glowrods, two breath masks, twenty-four breath mask filters, and a week's worth of rations. The multipack also included pockets and attachment points to carry a survey datapad, cutting blaster, vibroblade, ThinHut, portable heater, Universal Recharger, HydroExtractor, and a patching kit for thinsuits and ThinHuts.
